source.8b654213:
def indicator(n,nn):
    China_indicator= China[China['IndicatorCode']==n]
    Japan_indicator= Japan[Japan['IndicatorCode']==n]
    China_indicator2= China[China['IndicatorCode']==nn]
    Japan_indicator2= Japan[Japan['IndicatorCode']==nn]
    
    fig,ax=plt.subplots(nrows=1,ncols=1)
    fig,ax1=plt.subplots(nrows=1,ncols=1)
    ax.plot(China_indicator['Year'].values, China_indicator['Value'].values,label="China")
    ax.plot(Japan_indicator['Year'].values, Japan_indicator['Value'].values,label="Japan")
    ax1.plot(China_indicator2['Year'].values, China_indicator2['Value'].values,label="China")
    ax1.plot(Japan_indicator2['Year'].values, Japan_indicator2['Value'].values,label="Japan")

    ax.set_xlabel('Year')
    ax.set_ylabel(China_indicator['IndicatorName'].iloc[0])
    ax1.set_xlabel('Year')
    ax1.set_ylabel(China_indicator2['IndicatorName'].iloc[0])
 
    ax.set_title('China VS Japan'+" "+ China_indicator['IndicatorName'].iloc[0])
    ax1.set_title('China VS Japan'" "+ China_indicator2['IndicatorName'].iloc[0])

    ax.legend(loc='upper left')
    ax1.legend(loc='upper left')


    ax.ticklabel_format(useOffset=False,style='plain')
    ax1.ticklabel_format(useOffset=False,style='plain')

    China_indicator= China[China['IndicatorCode']==n]
    Japan_indicator= Japan[Japan['IndicatorCode']==n]
    China_indicator2= China[China['IndicatorCode']==nn]
    Japan_indicator2= Japan[Japan['IndicatorCode']==nn]
    China_pct=China_indicator['Value'].pct_change().dropna()
    China_pct2=China_indicator2['Value'].pct_change().dropna()
    China_len1=len(China_pct)
    China_len2=len(China_pct2)
    Japan_pct= Japan_indicator['Value'].pct_change().dropna()
    Japan_pct2=Japan_indicator2['Value'].pct_change().dropna()
    Japan_len1=len(Japan_pct)
    Japan_len2=len(Japan_pct2)
    fig,ax3=plt.subplots()
    fig,ax4=plt.subplots()
    if China_len1>China_len2:
            China_pct_fit=China_pct.iloc[0:China_len2]
            China_pct2_fit=China_pct2.iloc[0:China_len2]
            ax3.scatter(China_pct_fit,China_pct2_fit,s=100)
    else:
                China_pct_fit=China_pct.iloc[0:China_len1]
                China_pct2_fit=China_pct2.iloc[0:China_len1]
    ax3.set_xlabel(China_indicator['IndicatorName'].iloc[0]+' '+ '% change')
    ax3.set_ylabel(China_indicator2['IndicatorName'].iloc[0]+' '+ '% change')
    ax3.set_title('China Indicators Corr')
    ax3.scatter(China_pct_fit,China_pct2_fit,s=100,c="green",edgecolor='black',linewidth=1)
        
    if Japan_len1>Japan_len2:
            Japan_pct_fit=Japan_pct.iloc[0:Japan_len2]
            Japan_pct2_fit=Japan_pct2.iloc[0:Japan_len2]
            ax4.scatter(Japan_pct_fit,Japan_pct2_fit,s=100)
    else:
                Japan_pct_fit=Japan_pct.iloc[0:Japan_len1]
                Japan_pct2_fit=Japan_pct2.iloc[0:Japan_len1]
    ax4.set_xlabel(China_indicator['IndicatorName'].iloc[0]+' '+ '% change')
    ax4.set_ylabel(China_indicator2['IndicatorName'].iloc[0]+' '+ '% change')
    ax4.set_title('Japan Indicators Corr')
    ax4.scatter(Japan_pct_fit,Japan_pct2_fit,s=100,c="blue",edgecolor='black',linewidth=1)
    
    China_corrcoef=np.corrcoef(China_pct_fit,China_pct2_fit)
    Japan_corrcoef=np.corrcoef(Japan_pct_fit,Japan_pct2_fit)
    print('China corr is'+' '+ str(China_corrcoef[0,1]))
    print('Japan corr is'+' '+ str(Japan_corrcoef[0,1]))
    
indicator('SP.DYN.LE00.FE.IN','SP.DYN.LE00.MA.IN')
source.21f51153:
def indicator_corr(n,nn):
        China_indicator= China[China['IndicatorCode']==n]
        Japan_indicator= Japan[Japan['IndicatorCode']==n]
        China_indicator2= China[China['IndicatorCode']==nn]
        Japan_indicator2= Japan[Japan['IndicatorCode']==nn]
        China_pct=China_indicator['Value'].pct_change().dropna()
        China_pct2=China_indicator2['Value'].pct_change().dropna()
        China_len1=len(China_pct)
        China_len2=len(China_pct2)
        Japan_pct= Japan_indicator['Value'].pct_change().dropna()
        Japan_pct2=Japan_indicator2['Value'].pct_change().dropna()
        Japan_len1=len(Japan_pct)
        Japan_len2=len(Japan_pct2)
        fig,ax3=plt.subplots()
        fig,ax4=plt.subplots()
        if China_len1>China_len2:
            China_pct_fit=China_pct.iloc[0:China_len2]
            China_pct2_fit=China_pct2.iloc[0:China_len2]
            ax3.scatter(China_pct_fit,China_pct2_fit,s=100)
        else:
                China_pct_fit=China_pct.iloc[0:China_len1]
                China_pct2_fit=China_pct2.iloc[0:China_len1]
        ax3.set_xlabel('Indicator1 % change')
        ax3.set_ylabel('Indicator2 % change')
        ax3.set_title('China Indicators Corr')
        ax3.scatter(China_pct_fit,China_pct2_fit,s=100)
        
        if Japan_len1>Japan_len2:
            Japan_pct_fit=Japan_pct.iloc[0:Japan_len2]
            Japan_pct2_fit=Japan_pct2.iloc[0:Japan_len2]
            ax4.scatter(Japan_pct_fit,Japan_pct2_fit,s=100)
        else:
                Japan_pct_fit=Japan_pct.iloc[0:Japan_len1]
                Japan_pct2_fit=Japan_pct2.iloc[0:Japan_len1]
        ax4.set_xlabel('Indicator1 % change')
        ax4.set_ylabel('Indicator2 % change')
        ax4.set_title('Japan Indicators Corr')
        ax4.scatter(Japan_pct_fit,Japan_pct2_fit,s=100)
       # print(len(China_pct200))
    
indicator_corr('NY.GNS.ICTR.ZS','NY.GNS.ICTR.GN.ZS')
